articles.content: Before my world was reduced to a two-mile radius from my house, I never realised how interesting other peoples front gardens could be. When your life is confined to the same four walls, with each journey to the kitchen an odyssey, the world outside takes on a… [+8465 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft reveals it’s rolled its own QUIC and is testing it on Microsoft 365 and in .NET Core 5.0 - The Register
articles.description: The sequel to Pac-Man was Ms. Pac-Man. And Microsoft’s version of the Google-spawned TCP-killer QUIC is called MsQuic
articles.content:
Microsofts revealed its a user of QUIC the TCP successor thats integral to HTTP3 but hasnt quite excited too many folk beyond Google and Cloudflare.

articles.title: Airbus to deploy smell sensors to detect explosives on passengers - Financial Times
articles.description: System devised by neurotech start-up Koniku uses living cells
articles.content:
Airbus is planning to install jellyfish-like sensors at airports that mimic bomb-sniffing dogs’ ability to detect dangerous chemicals and explosives, using “game-changing” technology built from living biological cells that can “smell” molecular compounds.
